医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
亨利·福特健康研究人员获得资助，研究循环游离 DNA 甲基化作为神经胶质瘤检测的工具亨利·福特健康中心 (Henry Ford Health) 研究员 Houtan Noushmehr 博士获得了美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 颁发的近 290 万美元的著名 R01 拨款，用于支持名为“循环游离 DNA 甲基化作为神经胶质瘤检测和临床随访的准确工具。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Henry-Ford-Health-researcher-wins-grant-to-study-circulate-cell-free-DNA-methylation-as-a-tool-for-神经胶质瘤检测.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Henry-Ford-Health-researcher-wins-grant-to-study-circulate-cell-free-DNA-methylation-as-a-tool-for-神经胶质瘤检测.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8865e11e-6b0e-4df1-8a59-c7b8380938f8 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 10:41:34 -0400 Henry Ford Health researcher wins grant to study circulating cell-free DNA methylation as a tool for glioma detection
增加 COVID-19 加强疫苗的接种量：一次性个人提醒消息的影响通过发送一次性个人提醒，可以大大提高 COVID-19 加强疫苗接种率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Increasing-COVID-19-booster-vaccine-uptake-The-impact-of-one-time-personal-reminder-messages.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Increasing-COVID-19-booster-vaccine-uptake-The-impact-of-one-time-personal-reminder-messages.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=632420a2-65e6-4dea-a674-4b89469165ec Thu, 27 Jul 2023 10:29:00 -0400 Increasing COVID-19 booster vaccine uptake: The impact of one-time personal reminder messages
拥抱自然医学：探索药用植物治疗糖尿病研究人员描述了 20 种药用植物、其生物活性植物化学成分、治疗潜力、作用方式以及对抗糖尿病的前景和能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Embracing-natures-medicine-exploring-medicinal-plants-for-diabetes-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Embracing-natures-medicine-exploring-medicinal-plants-for-diabetes-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=edd69f17-57ba-4d59-8f41-029d430a935b Thu, 27 Jul 2023 10:26:00 -0400 Embracing nature's medicine: exploring medicinal plants for diabetes treatment

研究发现，患有系统性自身免疫性风湿性疾病的患者在感染 Omicron 后抗体反应低于健康对照者研究调查了系统性自身免疫性风湿病 (SARD) 患者的免疫反应是否降低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Study-finds-that-病人-with-systemic-autoimmune-rheumatic-diseases-had-a-lower-antibody-response-than-healthy-controls- Omicron 感染后.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Study-finds-that-病人-with-systemic-autoimmune-rheumatic-diseases-had-a-lower-antibody-response-than-healthy-controls- after-Omicron-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52248cc8-1bc4-49af-88e9-15f7172585a6 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 10:00:00 -0400 Study finds that patients with systemic autoimmune rheumatic diseases had a lower antibody response than healthy controls after Omicron infection

研究显示，吸烟者更容易产生烟草依赖根据《尼古丁与烟草研究》7 月发表的西奈山研究，吸烟者比吸电子烟或使用各种烟草产品的人更容易产生烟草依赖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Tobacco-dependence-more-likely-in-香烟-smokers-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230727/Tobacco-dependence-more-likely-in-香烟-smokers-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25ea7860-2dd7-4392-9295-554307788881 Thu, 27 Jul 2023 08:40:22 -0400 Tobacco dependence more likely in cigarette smokers, study reveals
